name: obsidian-vikunja-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.gen-sdk: rm -rf vikunja_sdk && openapi-generator-cli generate -i https://try.vikunja.io/api/v1/docs.json -o vikunja_sdk -g typescript-fetch --additional-properties "supportsES6=true,npmVersion=10.8.1,typescriptThreePlus=true"
